name: Fisherman Foes: Ocean Commotion
description:
Description

Grapple around the ship with your fishing rod and try to stay on top to score the most points! Use your momentum to beat your enemies and grapple onto them to throw them away!

Controls

Keyboard (+ Mouse):

  • Movement + Jump: WASD
  • Aim: Mouse
  • Grapple: Left Click
  • Pull to Grapple: Right Click
  • Pause / Unpause: ESC

Controller:

  • Movement: Left Joystick
  • Jump: A
  • Aim: Right Joystick
  • Grapple: Left Trigger
  • Pull to Grapple: Right Trigger
  • Pause / Unpause: START
